About Kompac Trading Company

We are a family-owned business with over 20+ years of trust in Chennai. We specialize in premium WPC and UPVC solutions that combine durability, aesthetics, and eco-friendliness.

Our expertise lies in providing moisture-resistant, termite-proof, and low-maintenance solutions perfectly suited for Chennai's climate. From doors and windows to complete home fixtures, we ensure quality that lasts.
